short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your ChatGPT.com experience: Expand screen space, remember unsent messages, hide avatars, and improve productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance the ChatGPT experience with this Google Chrome extension! This tool optimizes screen space, remembers unsent messages, hides avatars, and improves focus and productivity for a smoother interaction.

Key Features:

- Expanded Screen Space: Maximize the chat interface for improved readability and reduced scrolling.
- Focus and Productivity: Minimize distractions with hidden avatars and menus, and keep unsent messages saved for seamless sessions.
- Ideal for Efficiency: Perfect for small screens, ensuring optimal use of limited space.
- Enhanced Interaction: See more conversation history at once, managing context better for a comfortable user experience.

Overall, this extension aims to enhance comfort and efficiency by optimizing the ChatGPT interface layout. Install now to streamline your ChatGPT interactions!

Future Enhancements:

We're planning to add features like cycling through sent messages using the up arrow key and displaying a counter for remaining free messages. These additions will further improve user convenience and interaction with ChatGPT.
